subject: Frank Re: [EVP-ITC] "Alger help me!" ???
author: Al Harris
full_text:
Hi Frank,

Thanks for sharing your hypothesis -- it was very helpful. It sure
makes much better sense to me than some other theories. Yes, the "help
me's" bugged me, but now I know they're like many other situations in
life -- they are beyond my ability to do anything.

Thanks again,
Al

On 12/6/09, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...> wrote:
> Hey Al,
>
> When I started experimenting with the different forms of ITC I use to get
